Class AggressiveWhenSeeTargetData

Namespace
ECCLibrary.Data
Assembly
ECCLibrary.dll

Contains data pertaining to the AggressiveWhenSeeTarget component, which enables the creature to become aggressive towards specific fauna/the player.

public class AggressiveWhenSeeTargetData

Constructors

AggressiveWhenSeeTargetData(EcoTargetType, float, float, int, bool, bool, float, float)

Contains data pertaining to the AggressiveWhenSeeTarget component, which enables the creature to become aggressive towards specific fauna/the player.

public AggressiveWhenSeeTargetData(EcoTargetType targetType, float aggressionPerSecond, float maxRangeScalar, int maxSearchRings, bool ignoreSameKind = true, bool targetShouldBeInfected = false, float hungerThreshold = 0, float minimumVelocity = 0)

Parameters

targetType EcoTargetType

The targeted EcoTargetType of this specific component. Every creature can have multiple AggressiveWhenSeeTarget components. Remember, the Player is EcoTargetType.Shark!

aggressionPerSecond float

The amount of the aggression trait added each second while targeting a creature. Generally 1f-2f.

maxRangeScalar float

Creatures beyond this distance from the creature will not be targeted. Ranges from 15f for smaller predators to 150f for the Ghost Leviathan, however larger values are allowed.

maxSearchRings int

An arbitrary distance scale that influences how far creatures can be targeted from. Typically 1, but should be larger (3+) if the maxRangeScalar is higher.

ignoreSameKind bool

If false, this creature will attack other creatures with the same TechType.

targetShouldBeInfected bool

Only applicable for creatures similar to the Warper.

hungerThreshold float

Minimum amount of hunger needed to become aggressive to a target. Generally 0f, and rarely exceeds 0.1f unless the creature actually can eat it. In that case use a value around 0.8f.

minimumVelocity float

The minimum velocity required to see a target. Generally 0f and therefore unset, but the Crashfish for example has this value at 0.2f.
